prompt.p: Which of the following factors is NOT vitamin K-dependent?

modalFeedback.p: Option C (Factor VIII) is Correct. This is not a vitamin K-dependent factor.

Option A (Factor X) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.

Option B (Factor IX) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.

Option D (Factor VII) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.

Option E (Factor II) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.
Option C (Factor VIII) is Correct. This is not a vitamin K-dependent factor.

Option A (Factor X) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.

Option B (Factor IX) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.

Option D (Factor VII) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.

Option E (Factor II) is Incorrect. Factors X, IX, VII, II are vitamin K-dependent and form the extrinsic pathway of the coagulation pathway along with protein C and S. Warfarin affects the vitamin K-dependent factors.
